Job Description: Job Description    You will be responsible for delivering world-class software and have a significant impact on the space of Aftermarket Service Optimization. You will be working in and managing a highly agile, scrum-inspired team dedicated to a product or module. You will design solutions, write excellent code and assist developers through code reviews.    Design, develop and deploy microservices with focus on high availability, low latency and scalability.   Deliver maintainable, robust and testable code.   Designing and implementing software that is simple, intuitive and easy to use with a platform development mindset to solve real-world problems.   Collaborate with test engineers to define and write automated and manual tests to deliver a fully tested, high-quality services.   Work in an environment that supports your individual growth   Collaborate with both technical and business team members to understand requirements and develop solutions using an agile development process.   Drive a high standard of excellence for service scalability, and performance.
